alert.note: Alert for Pend Oreille (Washington) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Spokane (Eastern Washington and Northern Idaho)
info.headline: Flood Warning issued June 09 at 11:00PM PDT until further notice by NWS Spokane
info.description: ...The Flood Warning continues for the following rivers in Washington...Idaho... Palouse River near Potlatch affecting Latah and Whitman Counties. St Joe River at St Maries affecting Benewah County. Pend Oreille River below Albeni Falls affecting Pend Oreille and Bonner Counties. Rivers across the region are cresting and will slowly recede over the 12 to 24 hours. ...FLOOD WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL FURTHER NOTICE... * WHAT...Minor flooding is occurring and minor flooding is forecast. * WHERE...Pend Oreille River below Albeni Falls. * WHEN...Until further notice. * IMPACTS...At 100000.0 cfs, Beehive Lane and Bear Paw Dr will be flooded at low spots. Water will be up to several homes on Yergens Rd, Riverbend Loop Road, and on Highway 20 near Deeter Road. Water will be up to the south end of Riverbend Loop Road. Many yards, outbuildings, and recreational sites along the river between Newport and Ione will be flooded. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 5:00 AM PDT Wednesday the flow was 100600.0 cfs. - Forecast...The river is expected to continue rising...with flows reaching 106,000 cfs on Tuesday. - Flood flow is 95000.0 cfs. - http://www.weather.gov/safety/flood &&
info.instruction: Motorists should not attempt to drive around barricades or drive cars through flooded areas. Turn around, don`t drown when encountering flooded roads. Most flood deaths occur in vehicles. Additional information is available at www.weather.gov. The next statement will be issued this evening at 600 PM PDT.
